si.title: දරුවා මැරුවා
body_lines: මෙහනා ප්රදේශයේ නිවසේ ජල ටැංකියේ අවුරුදු තුනක දරුවෙකු මිය ගියේය.
මියගිය දරුවාගේ මව ඇගේ අවුරුදු නවයක් සහ ගෝල්ඩ් දරුවා නවයක් සහ තෙත් දරුවෙකු නිවසින් පිටත ඇති ස්ථානයට ගෙන ගොස් ඇත.
ඔබ නවයක් - ස්නානය කිරීමෙන් පසු - ගෝල්ඩ් දරුවෙකු ස්නානය කිරීමෙන් පසු - ජල ටැංකිය අසල-අවුරුදු-ගෝල්ඩ් දරුවෙකු රැගෙන ගියේය.
රෝහල් නිලධාරීන් පැවසුවේ දරුවා ප්රතිකාර නොමැතිව මිය ගිය බවයි.

en.title: Child killed
body_lines: A three -year -old child died in the water tank of the house in the Methena area.
The mother of the deceased child has taken her nine -year -old child and a three -year -old child to the place where the water tank is outside the house.
The mother who took a nine -year -old child after taking a bath and took a three -year -old child near the water tank.
The mother who came out was taken to the Meethena Hospital when she searched for a three -year -old child.
Hospital officials said the child died without treatment.

summary_lines: In the Methena area, a three-year-old child drowned in the family's water tank. The mother, with her two other children, ages nine and three, was present but couldn't save him. After searching, she found her missing three-year-old at the hospital, where he was pronounced dead upon arrival, indicating no medical intervention could have saved him.
